title: Stranger Things: Season 1
description: Enter the Upside Down and help the kids of Hawkins face supernatural horrors. Your choices could save Will Byers and change the fate of the entire town.

characters.name: Eleven
characters.description: A girl with psychokinetic abilities who escaped from Hawkins Lab
characters.personality: quiet, powerful, loyal, traumatized but brave
characters.background: Subject of government experiments, possesses telekinetic powers

characters.name: Mike Wheeler
characters.description: Leader of the group and Eleven's closest friend
characters.background: Middle schooler who becomes Eleven's protector and friend

characters.name: Dustin Henderson
characters.description: The group's comic relief with a love for science
characters.personality: curious, optimistic, scientific, brave despite fear
characters.background: Smart kid who uses science to understand the supernatural events

characters.name: Joyce Byers
characters.description: Will's mother who refuses to believe her son is dead
characters.background: Single mother who will do anything to save her missing son

checkpoints.title: Will's Disappearance
checkpoints.context: Will Byers goes missing after a D&D campaign
checkpoints.sceneDescription: The boys discover Will is missing and must decide how to search for their friend while adults dismiss their concerns.

mike.text: Organize a secret search party with the boys
Try to convince adults to take it seriously
Focus on the strange girl they found

checkpoints.title: The Upside Down Discovery
checkpoints.context: The group learns about the alternate dimension
checkpoints.sceneDescription: Eleven reveals the existence of the Upside Down and the group must decide how to use this knowledge.

eleven.text: Reveal everything about Hawkins Lab immediately
Only share what's necessary to save Will
Suggest going to the Upside Down together

checkpoints.title: Confronting the Demogorgon
checkpoints.context: The final confrontation with the monster from the Upside Down
checkpoints.sceneDescription: The Demogorgon has found the group and they must work together to survive and save Will.

joyce.text: Trust the kids and their supernatural ally
Try to get everyone to safety first

baseScript: In the small town of Hawkins, Indiana, a young boy named Will Byers disappears under mysterious circumstances...
